abstract: One benefit of an attack by a group like Anonymous: it can gird a company against more serious online espionage. What Anonymous has done, experts said at the big RSA computer security conference, is raise the alarm about the unguarded state of corporate computer systems. Read more »

headline.main: The Bright Side of Being Hacked
